Comments: Both configurations set the router ID to 1.1.1.1, though the commands differ.
Both configurations create an OSPFv3 process with ID 1.
Both configurations create an OSPFv3 area with ID 0.0.0.1.

Huawei:
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
ipv6 enable
ipv6 address 2001:db8:2::2/64
undo shutdown
Comments: Both configurations achieve the same result, though Huawei requires explicit IPv6 enablement.

Huawei:
interface GigabitEthernet3/0/0
ipv6 enable
ipv6 address 2001:db8:4::1/64
undo shutdown
Comments: Both configurations achieve the same result, though Huawei requires explicit IPv6 enablement.
Both configurations associate interfaces with OSPFv3 area 0.0.0.1, though the syntax differs.
